t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    arr = sorted(set(list(map(int, input().split()))))
    print(0 if len(arr) == 1 else arr[-2])

def soln(n, arr):
    unis = set(arr)
    if len(unis) == 1:
        return 0
    maxm = max(unis)
    unis.remove(maxm)
    sec_max = max(unis)
    return sec_max % maxm
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(soln(n, arr))

    print(min)
    i += 1

import sys
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    mod = max(l)
    s = len(l)
    maxim = 0
    for x in range(s):
        if l[x] % mod > maxim:
            maxim = l[x] % mod
    print(maxim)

t = int(input())
while t:
    t -= 1
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l.sort()
    mx = -1
    for i in l:
        m = i % l[n - 1]
        if m > mx:
            mx = m
    print(mx)

t = int(input())
while t:
    list = []
    t = t - 1
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    list2 = s.split()
    for i in range(n):
        list.append(int(list2[i]))
    p = max(list)
    for i in range(n):
        list[i] = list[i] % p
    print(max(list))

from sys import stdin, stdout
t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    t -= 1
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    m = max(a)
    mo = a[0] % m
    for x in range(n):
        if a[x] % m > mo:
            mo = a[x] % m
    print(mo)

from sys import stdin, stdout
t = int(stdin.readline())
while t > 0:
    t -= 1
    n = int(stdin.readline())
    a = list(map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    m = max(a)
    mo = a[0] % m
    for x in range(n):
        if a[x] % m > mo:
            mo = a[x] % m
    print(mo)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort(reverse=True)
    x = a[0]
    y = a[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        if a[i] != a[i - 1]:
            y = a[i]
            break
    ans = 0
    for i in a:
        ans = max(ans, x % i)
    print(max(ans, y % x))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    a.sort()
    i = n - 2
    while i >= 0 and a[i] == a[n - 1]:
        i -= 1
    ans = 0 if i == -1 else a[i]
    print(ans)
